name: Crayon Shin-Chan: Arashi o Yobu Cinema-Land no Daibouken!
overview: Developed by Inti Creates and published by Bandai Namco for Game Boy Advance, the game features bright and animated graphics, as well as a surprising amount of voiced dialogue. Throughout the game, Shin-chan will learn how to transform into different forms, such as a Monkey form, that allows him to use different abilities. He can also summon the other members of his family to perform different actions.
